column5: im stayin at the great wolf lodge next weekend, and my tourney season starts the following weekend out opf buffalo. so i need to get my license and figured while im in the falls ill run across and get it.  my question is, where is the closest place i can get it when i go across the boarder? wanna try and make the trip short and sweet.  thanks
No need to go anywhere if you have last years license just go online.  NY Licensing  Or just look for the nearest Walmart in NY.
dont have a license from last year, first time ever gettin an amercan license. but thanks
if you can't do that then search walmart.com and under locate store, type in 14303 or 14305 zip codes and that will give you the closest walmart to the border.
Walmart at Porter Road across the border sells them.  One line takes at least 2-3 weeks for you to get them.  Even first time applicants
I agree the Walmart on Porter Rd is going to be your best bet Darryl

thanks guys, was hoping to find a big place like dicks or gander mtn, but none are close to that area, dude's lol. oh well, walmart it is, at least i can get it! and should make the gf happy, no big fishing store to spend money in lol.
Darrel i'm heading over tommorow at 10 ish, ROAD TRIP!!!!!!, Give me a shout!

Can someone please help me with the math on this one   Wayne + Darryl + Gander MT = Short and Sweet  I can't for the life of me figure that one out      I think I maybe missing an X and Y component there with X = significant other and Y= baseball bat   Anyway have fun guys if you do get together.

LOL! yea, the wife would have my head on a platter if i went and spent a bunch MORE on tackle lol. but, didnt see waynes m,essage till just now, and i had a round of golf this morning, and now my kids bday party lol. so sadly, i did not go. im gonna shoot across next weekend. hope ya had fun wayne, and bring me back somethin nice!!
Well if you want to shoot across the border one night this week give me a shout wallyworld is open till 9PM and we can be over and back in about 30 minutes pending traffic.
